page.title: 16HOUSES IN LANGTOFT
page.content: We thought it might be interesting to see how many houses are in the village, what sort and also what they are made of.Langtoft is a small village on a crossroads of the fen road and the A15.Most of Langtoft is quite new but some of the houses in the middle of the village are very old. The village has got two shops,a post office,a pub called the Waggon and Horses,a garage,a butchers and a hairdressers.The village has existed for well over a thousand years.The village has got one church,St Micheal and All Angels which is made of stone and has cementry round it,there is a new cemetry along side the A15 at the South End of the village.We are doing a house survey to see how many houses,cottages etc, there are.The village contains 397 houses.
